View My Work

I Specialize In

Graphic Design as well as creating digital masterpieces and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications

Graphic Design

As a graphic designers I combine art and technology to communicate ideas through images and printed materials. I use a variety of design elements to achieve artistic effects.

UI/UX Design

UI/UX designers are primarily concerned with how the product feels. A given design problem has no single right answer. As a UI/UX designers I explore many different approaches to solving a specific user problem.

Photography

In photography I use technical expertise, creativity, and composition skills to produce and preserve images that visually tell a story or record an event.

Interaction

Using elements such as glyphs, icons, images, drawings, photographs, and color. Interaction is the process of creating, producing, and distributing material incorporating words and images to convey data, concepts, and emotions.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discovery

The goal of the discovery phase of my creative process is to develop an overall goal for the project and to define the context for the clients project.

2

Brainstorming

This is the critical phase of the creative process. Leveraging all the information gathered in the previous phase itâ€™s time to put on my designers hat and begin to brainstorm and conceptualize a design for the client.

3

Production

The goal of the production phase of the graphic design process is the production and development of a final concept for the project which outlines the overall look and feel.

4

Approval

In the final approval phase of the graphic design process the goal is to refine the final concepts in order to deliver the final product of the project.
